string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Sky
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the sky?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then to #bLudibrium#k? And once I get there, I'm supposed to walk my way down there through #bHelios Tower#k. That's pretty far...

Okay, now I'll tell you how to get to Korean Folk Town through the sky. First, head over to the station in #bEllinia#k. The ship that heads to #bOrbis#k should leave every 15 minutes. The station at Orbis is gigantic, and once there, you'll need to switch the flight to the ship that heads to #bLudibrium#k. At Ludibrium, it features two humongous towers, and you need to head over to #bHelios Tower#k and descend your way all the way down until you reach Korean Folk Town.
Alright, now talk to me once more so I can give you all the necessary items for the travel.
Please let me know when you're ready.
This ticket will enable you to get on board for the flight. Please use it wisely.
